narrative.narrative: Horizon Air is a regional carrier based out of Seattle-Tacoma. They also have hubs at Portland,Oregon, Los Angeles, and Anchorage. Their primary market is the western US and western Canada but also fly to Loreto,Mexico. They have 38 destinations and a fleet of 51 Dash 8 Q400's. It is the eighth largest regional airline in the USA. Their sister airline is Alaskan Airlines and they are both owned by the Alaska Air Group.
